hadGnomeTalk: Ow wow it's \NAME!!\nMy friend Mr. Gnomeman told me all about you!\nAren't gnomes so mysterious?
Mr. Gnomeman is actually a gnome!\nHe comes up with these conspiracy theories\nto throw everyone off his trail!
The climate in this area is weird.\nIt goes from forest to desert to snow all in\nfew miles!
